channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 波音737 MAX返回中国
item.description: Boeing was set to deliver its first 737 MAX to a Chinese airline since March 2019 on Wednesday, flight data shows, ending a four-year freeze for the U.S. planemaker's most profitable jet.翻译:飞行数据显示，波音将于周三向一家中国航空公司交付自 2019 年 3 月以来的首架 737 MAX，结束这家美国飞机制造商最赚钱的喷气式飞机四年来的冻结。
item.author: Valerie Insinna

item.title: 郑的目标是让德约科维奇在半决赛中“冷静”
item.description: Zheng Qinwen reached the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time with her win over Anna Kalinskaya on Wednesday, and now the Chinese 12th seed wants to learn to be as chilled as men's world number one Novak Djokovic.翻译:周三，郑沁文战胜安娜·卡林斯卡娅，首次进入澳大利亚网球公开赛半决赛，现在这位中国12号种子想要学习像男子世界排名第一的诺瓦克·德约科维奇那样冷静。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：欧盟立法者表示，欧洲将于下周就供应链紧急权力达成一致
item.description: EU countries and lawmakers are expected to agree on rules next week which would force Europe-based companies to prioritise production of key products to prevent a supply chain crisis, a key lawmaker in charge of the legislation said on Wednesday.翻译:负责该立法的一位主要立法者周三表示，预计欧盟国家和立法者将在下周就规则达成一致，这将迫使欧洲公司优先生产关键产品，以防止供应链危机。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 波音将向中国交付737 MAX喷气式飞机，在动荡中投下信任票
item.description: Boeing is set to deliver its first 737 MAX to a Chinese airline since March 2019 on Wednesday, flight data shows, ending an almost five-year freeze on imports of the U.S. planemaker's most profitable product in a respite for severely strained trade relations between the world's two largest economies.翻译:飞行数据显示，波音将于周三向一家中国航空公司交付自 2019 年 3 月以来的首架 737 MAX，结束了这家美国飞机制造商利润最高的产品近五年来的进口冻结，为中美之间严重紧张的贸易关系带来了喘息之机。两个最大的经济体。
item.author: Valerie Insinna

item.title: 委员会在加拿大外国干涉调查中寻求有关印度的信息
item.description: An independent commission probing alleged foreign interference in Canada asked the Trudeau government on Wednesday to share information about possible meddling in elections by India, a development that could aggravate already-tense Ottawa-New Delhi relations.翻译:一个调查加拿大涉嫌外国干涉的独立委员会周三要求特鲁多政府分享有关印度可能干预选举的信息，这一事态发展可能会加剧渥太华与新德里之间本已紧张的关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国海军称约翰·芬恩号航空母舰在台湾海峡进行过境
item.description: The United States Navy said its USS John Finn destroyer翻译:美国海军称其约翰·芬恩号驱逐舰
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国江西省商店火灾造成39人死亡、多人被困
item.description: A fire at a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped.翻译:中国官方媒体和当地政府周三表示，江西省新余市一家街边商店发生火灾，已造成 39 人死亡、9 人受伤，并补充说仍有一些人被困。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与乌兹别克斯坦建立更紧密的联系，推动铁路路线绕过俄罗斯
item.description: China on Wednesday upgraded its diplomatic ties with Uzbekistan and offered closer cooperation across a range of projects, including a Central Asia railway that would open up a new trade route as shippers shun an existing overland link via Russia.翻译:中国周三升级了与乌兹别克斯坦的外交关系，并在一系列项目上提供了更密切的合作，其中包括一条中亚铁路，该铁路将开辟一条新的贸易路线，因为托运人将避开现有的经由俄罗斯的陆路连接。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 锡因过剩而受到束缚，但绿色工业需求将消除供应
item.description: The potential for a build-up of tin supplies this year is likely to put pressure on prices, but accelerating demand from the energy transition sector, including solar panels and electric vehicles, should support prices in the future.翻译:今年锡供应量增加的可能性可能会给价格带来压力，但太阳能电池板和电动汽车等能源转型行业需求的加速增长应该会支撑未来的价格。
item.author: Pratima Desai

item.title: 印度必须批准 GIFT City 与邻国投资者的上市
item.description: Indian government approval will be needed if a local company with shareholders from neighbouring countries such as China wants to list on exchanges registered in a new financial hub, according to rules issued on Wednesday.翻译:根据周三发布的规定，如果一家拥有中国等邻国股东的当地公司想要在新金融中心注册的交易所上市，则需要获得印度政府的批准。
item.author: Nikunj Ohri, Jayshree Pyasi

item.title: 早盘竞价：提振对脆弱中国的信心
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Dhara Ranasinghe翻译:达拉·拉纳辛格 (Dhara Ranasinghe) 展望美国和全球市场未来一天
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 郑重其事地击败卡林斯卡娅，进入澳网半决赛
item.description: Zheng Qinwen shook off a sluggish start to outclass Russian Anna Kalinskaya 6-7(4) 6-3 6-1 on Wednesday and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time where the Chinese 12th seed will take on Ukrainian qualifier Dayana Yastremska.翻译:周三，郑沁文一改开局不利的局面，以6-7(4) 6-3 6-1击败俄罗斯选手安娜·卡林斯卡娅，首次进入澳网半决赛，中国12号种子将迎战乌克兰预选赛选手达亚娜·亚斯特雷姆斯卡。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 兹维列夫闯入澳网半决赛，阿尔卡拉斯无路可逃
item.description: Alexander Zverev served up a huge shock at the Australian Open on Wednesday by stunning second seed Carlos Alcaraz to make the semi-finals after third seed Daniil Medvedev fought hard to avoid an upset at the hands of Hubert Hurkacz.翻译:周三，亚历山大·兹维列夫在澳大利亚网球公开赛上给二号种子卡洛斯·阿尔卡拉斯带来了巨大冲击，三号种子丹尼尔·梅德韦杰夫奋力拼搏，避免被休伯特·胡尔卡茨爆冷，进入半决赛。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 调查显示更多德国企业离开中国或考虑退出
item.description: The proportion of German firms exiting the Chinese market or considering doing so has more than doubled to 9% in the past four years, according to a survey by the German Chamber of Commerce in China.翻译:中国德国商会的一项调查显示，过去四年，德国企业退出或考虑退出中国市场的比例增加了一倍多，达到9%。
item.author: Sarah Marsh

item.title: 中国反驳越南对南海争议岛屿的主张
item.description: The Chinese foreign ministry on Wednesday said China's claims to the Paracel and Spratly Islands in the South China Sea were backed by "history" after Vietnam over the weekend repeated it had sufficient evidence to claim sovereignty over the islands.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中国对南海西沙群岛和南沙群岛的主权主张有“历史”支持，此前越南周末重申有足够证据证明对这些岛屿拥有主权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国火箭初创公司东方航天融资近8400万美元
item.description: China's private rocket developer Orienspace has raised nearly 600 million yuan ($83.67 million) to fund rocket development, it said on Wednesday, as China's demand for commercial launches of satellites is expected to increase.翻译:中国私营火箭开发商东方航天周三表示，由于中国对卫星商业发射的需求预计将增加，该公司已筹集近 6 亿元人民币（合 8367 万美元）用于火箭开发。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国恒大海外债券持有人集团将加入清算申请--消息人士
item.description: A key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, two sources with direct knowledge said.翻译:两位直接知情人士称，中国恒大的一个主要离岸债券持有人集团计划在周一香港法院的听证会上加入清算该开发商的请愿书。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 中国提振经济信心的努力失败
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang went to the World Economic Forum in Davos last week with a mission to present a positive image of the economy and schmooze financial elites: "Investing in the Chinese market is not a risk, but an opportunity."翻译:中国总理李强上周出席达沃斯世界经济论坛，其使命是展示中国经济的正面形象并与金融精英进行交流：“投资中国市场不是风险，而是机遇。”
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 欧洲股市因乐观的科技盈利和中国央行的援助而上涨
item.description: European shares rose over 1% on Wednesday, boosted by technology stocks after software company SAP and chip-making equipment maker ASML Holding posted strong earnings, while fresh stimulus from China's central bank further aided sentiment.翻译:软件公司 SAP 和芯片制造设备制造商 ASML Holding 公布强劲盈利后，欧洲股市周三上涨超过 1%，受到科技股的提振，而中国央行的新刺激措施进一步提振了市场情绪。
item.author: Shristi A, Shubham Batra

item.title: 美国原油大量撤离和中国刺激措施推动油价小幅上涨 1%
item.description: Oil prices edged up about 1% on Wednesday on a bigger-than-expected U.S. crude storage withdrawal, a slump in U.S. crude output, Chinese economic stimulus, geopolitical tensions and a weaker dollar.翻译:由于美国原油库存撤出量超出预期、美国原油产量下滑、中国经济刺激、地缘政治紧张局势以及美元走软，周三油价小幅上涨约 1%。
item.author: Scott Disavino
